tutorial.title: Aligning Grid Items
tutorial.descriptionContent: Organize grid items along the main and cross axis of a grid.

lessons.title: Intro
lessons.interactiveContent: Let's learn how to align grid items relative to their grid areas. Press the buttons below to align the grid items along the row axis.

lessons.title: Row axis - stretch
lessons.interactiveContent:
We use the justify-items property to align grid items along the row axis. The default value stretch means they fill all available space.

Make sure to pick justify-items, followed by stretch.

lessons.title: Row axis - start
lessons.interactiveContent:
If we want to align grid items to the left edge of the grid area along the row axis, we use the start value.

Make sure to pick start.

lessons.title: Row axis - end
lessons.interactiveContent:
To align grid items to the right edge of the grid area along the row axis, we set justify-items to the value end.

Make sure to pick end.

lessons.title: Row axis - center
lessons.interactiveContent:
center is used to align the grid items to the center of the row axis. Set justify-items to center.

Make sure to type center.

lessons.title: Column axis - stretch
lessons.interactiveContent:
If we want to align grid items along the column axis, we use align-items. Set it to stretch to have them occupy the entire grid area.

Make sure to pick align-items, followed by stretch.

lessons.title: Column axis - start and end
lessons.interactiveContent:
If we want to align grid items to the top or bottom edge of the grid area along the column axis, we use start or end. Let's use end below.

Make sure to pick end.

lessons.title: Column axis - center
lessons.interactiveContent:
center is used to align the grid items to the center of the column axis. Code this value below.

Make sure to type center.

lessons.title: Question: Row axis - stretch
lessons.interactiveContent:
What is the default value for justify-items?

stretchstart

Make sure to pick stretch.

lessons.title: Question: Row axis - start
lessons.interactiveContent:
What does the following justify-items value do?

It aligns grid items to the left edge of the grid areaIt aligns grid items to the right edge of the grid area

It aligns grid items to the left edge of the grid area.

lessons.title: Question: Row axis - end
lessons.interactiveContent:
What justify-items value does this grid have?

endleft

Make sure to pick end.

lessons.title: Question: Row axis - center
lessons.interactiveContent:
What justify-items value does this grid have?

centerstretch

Make sure to pick center.

lessons.title: Question: Column axis - stretch
lessons.interactiveContent:
What happens when we set the align-items property to stretch?

The grid item is set to occupy the entire grid area along the column axisThe grid item is set to occupy the entire grid area along the row axis

The grid item is set to occupy the entire grid area along the column axis.

lessons.title: Question: Column axis - start and end
lessons.interactiveContent:
Which property does this grid have?

align-items: end;align-items: stretch;

align-items: end;.

lessons.title: Question: Column axis - center
lessons.interactiveContent:
What does align-items: center; do?

It pushes grid items to the center of the column axisIt pushes grid items to the center of the row axis

It pushes grid items to the center of the column axis.

lessons.title: Example: Row axis property
lessons.interactiveContent:
Code the property that aligns grid items along the row axis.

Make sure to pick justify-items.

lessons.title: Example: Row axis - start
lessons.interactiveContent:
Code the value so that the grid items are aligned to the left edge of their grid area along the row axis.

Make sure to pick start.

lessons.title: Example: Row axis - end
lessons.interactiveContent:
Set justify-items to the value that aligns grid items to the right edge of their grid area.

Make sure to pick end.

lessons.title: Example: Row - center
lessons.interactiveContent:
Code the value so that the grid items are aligned to the center of the row axis.

Make sure to pick center.

lessons.title: Example: Column - stretch
lessons.interactiveContent:
Code the align-items property that makes grid items occupy their entire grid area.

Make sure to pick align-items, followed by stretch.

lessons.title: Example: Column - start and end
lessons.interactiveContent:
Align the grid items to the bottom edge of their grid area.

Make sure to pick end.

lessons.title: Example: Column - center
lessons.interactiveContent:
Align the grid items to the center of the grid column axis.

Make sure to type center.
